content.question: Which of the following was a difference between the colonization efforts of other European empires and the Spanish?

choices.label: The British directed more effort toward converting Native Americans to Christianity than did the Spanish.
The British more frequently intermarried with Native Americans than did the Spanish.
The Dutch relied more on Native American laborers in their economy than did the Spanish.
The French sent fewer settlers to their American colonies than did the Spanish.

content.answer: The French sent fewer settlers to their American colonies than did the Spanish.
